page.title: 08THE PRIMARY SCHOOL WEEK
page.content: There are 220 children at Borough Green County Primary {School}. We are aged 5 to 11 years, and we are at school for six -and -a -half hours on weekdays starting at 9 a.m. We have seven teachers including a Head. Every day we have Maths., English and Reading. We do Science, History, Geography and Religious Education as projects. We also have Art, Handwriting Needlework, Craft, P.E., Games and Swimming. We have a {computer} day once a week when we go on our two {computers}. On Saturday morning in the Summer there is Swimming in our pool, and in Winter there is Football, run by the parents. Parents also help in school hearing reading and doing cooking with the children. (by R.Layberry,S.Whittle P.Belzar,D.Clifton,T.Scudder,J.Holder and M.Peirce, all 10).
